description: A power plant manager is arrested after 20,000 tonnes of oil polluted an Arctic river.
title: Arctic Circle oil spill prompts Putin to declare state of emergency
title_page: Arctic Circle oil spill prompts Putin to declare state of emergency - BBC News
maintext: "Why did government agencies only find out about this two days after the fact?" he asked the subsidiary's chief, Sergei Lipin. "Are we going to learn about emergency situations from social media?"
